parts.text: {"word":"desmancharse","priority":"N/A","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(再帰動詞) シミが取れる、汚れが落ちる","english_definition":"(reflexive verb) to come clean, to have stains removed; to lose stains.","examples":[{"sentence":"Esta camisa se desmancha fácilmente.","translation":"このシャツは簡単にシミが取れる。"},{"sentence":"La mancha no se desmancha.","translation":"そのシミは落ちない。"}],"collocations":["desmancharse fácilmente (簡単にシミが取れる)","no desmancharse (シミが取れない)"],"synonyms":["limpiarse","lavarse","aclararse"],"antonyms":["mancharse","ensuciarse"]}],"etymology":{"value":"'Des-' (取り除く) + 'manchar' (汚す、シミをつける) + '-se' (再帰代名詞)。つまり、文字通りには「自分からシミを取り除く」という意味。","priority":"N/A"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/des.manˈt͡ʃaɾ.se/","syllables":"des-man-char-se"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["me desmancho","te desmanchas","se desmancha","nos desmanchamos","os desmancháis","se desmanchan"],"past_simple":["me desmanché","te desmanchaste","se desmanchó","nos desmanchamos","os desmanchasteis","se desmancharon"],"future_simple":["me desmancharé","te desmancharás","se desmanchará","nos desmancharemos","os desmancharéis","se desmancharán"],"conditional_simple":["me desmancharía","te desmancharías","se desmancharía","nos desmancharíamos","os desmancharíais","se desmancharían"],"present_subjunctive":["me desmanche","te desmanches","se desmanche","nos desmanchemos","os desmanchéis","se desmanchen"],"past_subjunctive":["me desmanchara/desmanchase","te desmancharas/desmanchases","se desmanchara/desmanchase","nos desmancháramos/desmanchásemos","os desmancharais/desmanchaseis","se desmancharan/desmanchasen"],"imperative":["(tú) desmancha","(vosotros) desmanchad"]}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Desmancharse' は再帰動詞なので、常に再帰代名詞（me, te, se, nos, os, se）を伴います。主語がシミの取れる対象（通常は衣類など）であり、その対象自身がシミを取るというニュアンスを表します。","priority":"N/A"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Yo desmancho la camisa.","correct":"Yo desmancho la camisa. (正しくても意味が異なる: 私はシャツからシミを取る)", "Yo me desmancho la camisa. (不自然)","note":"'Desmanchar' (非再帰動詞) は「～からシミを取る」という意味で、目的語はシミの付いた物です。'Desmancharse' は「シミが取れる」という意味で、主語はシミの取れる物です。"},{"incorrect":"La mancha desmancha.","correct":"La mancha se desmancha. (稀に詩的な表現)","note":"通常、シミが自然に取れる場合は 'La mancha se desmancha' と再帰動詞を使います。"}],"priority":"N/A"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["desmanchado/a (シミが取れた)","desmanchador/a (シミ取り剤、シミ取りをする人)","mancha (シミ)","manchar (汚す、シミをつける)"],"phrasal_verbs":[]},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"N/A","frequency_google_ngram":"低頻度","priority":"N/A"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"'Desmancharse'は、服や他の物からシミが取れることを表す再帰動詞です。再帰動詞なので、'se'、'me'、'te'などの再帰代名詞と一緒に使われます。例えば、'La camisa se desmanchó'は「シャツのシミが取れた」という意味です。この動詞は、シミが自然に取れるか、洗濯などのプロセスで取れる場合に使われます。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Este tipo de tela se desmancha con agua fría.","translation":"このタイプの生地は冷水でシミが取れます。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"シミが取れる"},{"sentence":"¿Cómo puedo hacer para que esta mancha se desmanche?","translation":"どうすればこのシミを落とせますか？","type":"verb","meaning_category":"シミが取れる"},{"sentence":"A pesar de lavarla varias veces, la mancha no se desmanchó.","translation":"何度も洗ったにもかかわらず、シミは落ちませんでした。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"シミが取れない"}]}
